lead_paragraph: Dickstein, plagued by partner defections and legal woes, once had 400 lawyers in five offices specializing in regulatory and intellectual property.

headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Troubled Law Firm to Merge With Blank Rome
headline.main: Troubled Dickstein Shapiro Law Firm to Merge With Blank Rome

snippet: Dickstein, plagued by partner defections and legal woes, once had 400 lawyers in five offices specializing in regulatory and intellectual property.
abstract: Troubled Washington law firm Dickstein Shapiro will close and become part of Philadelphia firm Blank Rome.
